function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of SARS CoV-2 infection","Impact":"High number of infected cases and fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced technological solutions and pandemic preparedness","Technologies":"Advanced medical technology, testing and monitoring systems, AI for epidemic prediction","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Surge demands for critical care facilities","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, inability to provide adequate care","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, disaster management, and preventive medicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, hospital management systems","People":"High-risk patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, technology companies"},{"Description":"Failure to provide protective gear and medical supplies","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among healthcare workers and general population","Mitigation":"Implementation of efficient supply chain management and mass production of medical supplies","Technologies":"Supply chain automation, 3D printing for medical equipment, advanced logistics systems","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Governments, medical supply companies, technology companies"}]}
